programme.title: Bargain Hunt
programme.desc: Join Christina Trevanion and experts Catherine Southon and Kate Bliss as they go antique hunting in Peterborough, Cambridgeshire, before heading to Lichfield in Staffordshire for today's auction. Christina discovers the history of the humble jigsaw and takes a closer look at a huge collection of puzzles.

programme.title: Clive Myrie's Italian Road Trip
programme.desc: Clive celebrated his 40th birthday in Sicily, but like most visitors, he stuck to the beaches. Now he's travelling inland in the footsteps of his travel hero, the 19th-century African-American writer Booker T Washington. He also meets people from around the world who've bought homes in the Euro house hub of Mussomeli and discovers Italy's best street food in the island's capital Palermo.

programme.title: Between the Covers
programme.desc: Sara is joined by comedian Sara Pascoe, actor and author Charlie Higson, singer-songwriter Katie Melua and actor and dancer Adam Garcia. They share their favourite books and review the two book club choices: the new book pick, Strange Sally Diamond by Liz Nugent, and the fourth of a selection of books set in Europe to celebrate Eurovision, The Summer Book by Tove Jansson, which is set in Finland.

programme.title: Caught Red Handed
programme.desc: A homeowner makes an alarming discovery after hearing a bump in the night. A parrot owner is spitting feathers when his beloved bird is stolen, and a doorbell camera solves the puzzle of a missing monkey-puzzle tree.

programme.title: Nicky Campbell BBC News Talk
programme.desc: Nicky Campbell takes your calls on the day's talking points, hearing views and experiences from across the UK. Call 08085 909693 between 9am and 11am on weekdays (calls are free from mobiles and landlines).

programme.title: BBC News
programme.desc: A suivre, les dernières actualités présentées par les équipes rédactionnelles de la BBC, le très réputé radiodiffuseur du service public britannique. Créée en 1922 à Londres, la British Broadcast Corporation est connue pour être la plus ancienne société diffusant des programmes de radio ou de télévision au monde.

programme.title: Impossible
programme.desc: Game show in which players must avoid giving impossible answers to a set of questions.

programme.title: Eggheads
programme.desc: General knowledge quiz featuring probably the greatest quiz team in Britain

programme.title: Un menu en or
programme.desc: Des cuisiniers et des restaurateurs tentent de faire la promotion de leurs recettes devant des investisseurs. Les plus audacieux et talentueux ouvriront leur restaurant. (VO : Million Pound Menu).

programme.title: Cap sur l'Atlantique
programme.desc: Saison 1 Episode 3 Les eaux chaudes de l'Atlantique tropical sont peuplées de requins baleines, de méduses, de tarpans, ainsi que de dauphins tachetés et leurs petits. Année de réalisation : 2015

programme.title: The Great British Sewing Bee
programme.desc: The sewers make patchwork jackets from scraps and turn second-hand duvets into dresses.

programme.title: Flog It !
programme.desc: Today, Flog It! comes from Penrhyn Castle in north Wales. Antiques expert David Harper looks at some vintage World War II posters, and Claire Rawle is surprised by a valuable watch that was found in the bottom of a book bag. Presenter Paul Martin goes under a mountain to look at Britain's biggest water-powered generator.

programme.title: Richard Osman's House of Games
programme.desc: Matt Edmondson, Sabrina Grant, Andy Hamilton, and Kirsty Wark face more trivia questions.

programme.title: Clive Myrie's Italian Road Trip
programme.desc: Famous for the ruins of Pompei, the coastline around Mount Vesuvius has been a holiday destination since Roman times. Heading off the tourist track, Clive unearths why volcanic soil makes for the tastiest fruit and veg, learns to make Italian marmalade, uncovers the surprising royal tale behind Italy's first train line, and tries his hand at carving jewellery from coral found deep beneath the sea.

programme.title: Amol Rajan Interviews
programme.desc: Amol Rajan joins Sir Richard Branson on one of his cruise ships in Miami to discuss his life, loves, passions and challenges. In a sometimes uncomfortable interview with rarely seen archive footage, Rajan delves into Branson's background to discover how he went from 60s hippy to global business icon, re-shaping multiple industries and ending up in space.

programme.title: Grand Tours of Scotland's Lochs
programme.desc: Saison 2 Episode 2 Series in which Paul Murton takes a tour of Scotland's lochs. Paul views breathtaking scenery among the lochs and mountains of Wester Ross. Speaking to locals, he discovers that the loch-side communities were only finally connected by road in the 1970s. Before then, boats linked people who lived an almost island existence. Paul borrows a bike and cycles over the infamous Bealach na Ba, one of Britain's highest and steepest mountain passes, before reliving the glory days of the Kishorn oil rig fabrication yard, which in the 1970s built the world's biggest movable structure. Journey's end is on an island in Loch Carron with a curious connection with Peter Pan. Année de réalisation : 2018

programme.title: Reunion Hotel
programme.desc: Three-year-old Nova has an extremely rare condition, with doctors saying it was unlikely she would ever walk and talk. A medical suit exists that could help Nova take her first step, but there was no NHS funding available. But staff at a local care home were able to raise the money after hearing Nova's story, and mother Sam wants to meet the fundraisers. After losing his sight in 2018, Terry's life has been transformed by his guide dog Spencer, and Terry is desperate to meet Maggie, the woman who trained Spencer as a puppy, to let her know how Spencer has changed everything for the good. And Pat arrives at the hotel, hoping to meet the former boss who supported her during one of the most difficult times of her life.

programme.title: Newsnight
programme.desc: In-depth news and current affairs review of the main political and economic stories of the day, featuring robust interviews with senior government and opposition figures, business and trade union leaders.

programme.title: Nadiya: Anxiety and Me
programme.desc: Nadiya Hussain sets out to find the cause of her anxiety, and explores various treatments.

programme.title: Sus
programme.desc: Powerful, claustrophobic drama adaptated from the taut Barrie Keeffe play. It is election night, 1979. After his wife has been found dead, Delroy is brought in for what he believes will be casual police questioning. However, the racist DS Karn and his violent colleague DC Whilby carry out a rough and highly confrontational interrogation in which they try to force Delroy to confess to the crime. Année de réalisation : 2010

programme.title: Secrets of the Chippendales Murders
programme.desc: Saison 1 Episode 3 The NYPD investigate multiple leads into the murder of Nick De Noia. Possible motives include a love triangle, insurance fraud, and an angry boss--all of which lead nowhere. Years later, the FBI receive a tip from a hitman named 'Strawberry', who blows the case wide open. Année de réalisation : 2021

programme.title: Secrets of the Chippendales Murders
programme.desc: Saison 1 Episode 4 The FBI teams up with down-and-out actor Ray Colon, who leads federal agents on an international manhunt for the person behind Nick De Noia's murder. However, even after the mystery is solved and the killer is behind bars, the show is far from over. Soon to follow is a shocking death and the discovery of tens of millions of dollars secretly hidden in Switzerland. Année de réalisation : 2021

programme.title: This is BBC Two
programme.desc: This is BBC Two.
